title: Large-Scale Social Media-Based Leadership Expertise Enhancement Course in Scientific Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories and practical experience, along with fundamental smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: For learners needing to enhance expertise development and networking skills via social media as science field managers/leaders in corporate settings. Blended environment combining offline workshops with mobile-based online learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for sharing expertise in corporate science-focused social media communities.
Learners can build domestic and international science expert networks via social media and identify at least two collaboration opportunities.
Learners can use social media analytics tools to write science trend reports and apply them to practical tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
